casebody.data:
Timothy L. JARQUIN
v.
Danny R. BLANKS, Individually and in his Capactiy as a Member and Manager of Pontchartrain Partners, L.L.C.; Barlow J. Cook, Individually and in his Capacity as a Member of Pont Chartrain Partners, L.L.C; James R. Washington, III, Individually and in his Capacity as a Member of Pontchartrain Partners, L.L.C.; Mary LeBlanc, Individually and in her Capacity as Director of Human Resources of Pontchartrain Partners, L.L.C. NO. 2018-CC-0548 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 25, 2018 Denied. GENOVESE, J., would grant.
